com.arkoisystems.arkoicompiler.stage

Class AbstractStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arkoisystems.arkoicompiler.stage.AbstractStage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexicalAnalyzer, SemanticAnalyzer, SyntaxAnalyzer

    public abstract class AbstractStage
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract version of a stage which has some pre-defined methods to overwrite. Every stage need to have an ErrorHandler to report errors and the processStage() method which will execute the code of the current stage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractStage() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract ErrorHandler errorHandler()
      Returns the ErrorHandler of the current stage.
      abstract boolean processStage()
      This is an essential method to provide the capability to run every stage with the same method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractStage

        public AbstractStage()

    • Method Detail

      • errorHandler

        public abstract ErrorHandler errorHandler()
        Returns the ErrorHandler of the current stage. So every stage needs to provide such a ErrorHandler which will make a lot of things easier.
        Returns:
        the ErrorHandler of the current stage.

      • processStage

        public abstract boolean processStage()
        This is an essential method to provide the capability to run every stage with the same method. Also it will return a flag (boolean), which will say if an error occurred or not.
        Returns:
        the flag if an error occurred or not.
